metadataAttributes.Title: Futures Thinking Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Ready Yourself for a Changing World. Learn the skills and mindsets of the world’s top futurists, so you can forecast what’s coming, imagine new possibilities, and seize control of your own future.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Strategic Foresight, Simulation, Scenario Design, Future Forecasting, Foresight, Creativity, Strategic Thinking, Innovation, Leadership, Scenario Development, Strategic Planning, Gaming,
